Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(java.lang.String given,
              java.lang.String family,
              java.lang.String number,
              java.lang.String dob)
Constructs a Player object with the given information.

Parameters:
given - a String containing the Player's first (given) name.
family - a String containing the Player's last (family) name.
number - a String containing the Player's designated number.
dob - a String containing the Player's date of birth in MM/DD/YYYY format.
